name: farrago
title: Farrago
description: An extension for interacting with the soundboard app Farrago.
author: boradatti

commands.name: fade-all
commands.title: Fade All Sounds
commands.description: Fade All Sounds Currently Playing in Farrago

commands.name: stop-all
commands.title: Stop All Sounds
commands.description: Stop All Sounds Currently Playing in Farrago

preferences.name: oscRemoteHost
preferences.title: OSC Remote Host
preferences.description: OSC host defined in Farrago under "OSC Input"

preferences.name: oscRemotePort
preferences.title: OSC Remote Port
preferences.description: OSC port defined in Farrago under "OSC Input"

preferences.name: oscLocalHost
preferences.title: OSC Local Host
preferences.description: OSC host defined in Farrago under "OSC Input"

preferences.name: oscLocalPort
preferences.title: OSC Local Port
preferences.description: OSC port defined in Farrago under "OSC Input"

preferences.name: shortcutTitleTemplate
preferences.title: Shortcut Title Template
preferences.description:
Template to be used when you copy a sound's shortcut title w/ ⇧⌘C.
Available variables: {{title}}, {{icons}}, {{firstIcon}}, {{set}}.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
